title: TMDb Comprehensive Scraper
description: Scrape comprehensive movie, TV show, and people data from The Movie Database (TMDb). Supports API access with fallback to website scraping.

apiKey.title: TMDb API Key (Optional)
apiKey.description: Your TMDb API key (v3 auth). If provided, uses TMDb API for faster data collection. If not provided, falls back to website scraping. Get one at https://www.themoviedb.org/settings/api

useApiFirst.title: Use API First (when available)
useApiFirst.description: If true and API key is provided, attempts to use TMDb API first. If false or API key is missing, uses website scraping directly.

contentType.title: Content Type
contentType.description: Type of content to scrape: movies, TV shows, people, or both movies and TV shows.

searchQueries.title: Search Queries
searchQueries.description: List of search terms to query TMDb for. Each query will be searched separately.

genreIds.title: Genre IDs
genreIds.description: TMDb genre IDs to filter by. For movies: 28=Action, 35=Comedy, 18=Drama, etc. For TV: 10759=Action&Adventure, 16=Animation, 35=Comedy, etc.

yearFrom.title: Release Year From
yearFrom.description: Minimum release year to filter content.

yearTo.title: Release Year To
yearTo.description: Maximum release year to filter content.

resultsWanted.title: Maximum Results
resultsWanted.description: Maximum number of content items to collect per search query.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of API result pages to fetch (each page contains ~20 items).

sortBy.title: Sort By
sortBy.description: Sort order for discover endpoint. Only used when no search queries are provided.

collectPeople.title: Collect People Data
collectPeople.description: Collect detailed information about people (actors, directors, etc.) associated with the content.

collectReviews.title: Collect Reviews
collectReviews.description: Collect user reviews for movies and TV shows.

collectKeywords.title: Collect Keywords
collectKeywords.description: Collect keywords/tags associated with the content.

collectImages.title: Collect Images
collectImages.description: Collect poster and backdrop images for the content.

maxReviewsPerContent.title: Max Reviews Per Content
maxReviewsPerContent.description: Maximum number of reviews to collect per movie/TV show.

maxImagesPerContent.title: Max Images Per Content
maxImagesPerContent.description: Maximum number of images to collect per movie/TV show.

minDelayMs.title: Minimum Delay (ms)
minDelayMs.description: Minimum delay between requests to respect rate limits.

maxDelayMs.title: Maximum Delay (ms)
maxDelayMs.description: Maximum delay between requests for randomization.

peopleQuery.title: People Search Query
peopleQuery.description: Search query for people when contentType is 'person'.

peopleResultsWanted.title: People Results Wanted
peopleResultsWanted.description: Maximum number of people to collect when searching for people.
